CustomFieldTranslation.name: Total_Allocations_Last_N_Days__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: The number of Allocations from Closed/Won Opportunities in the last N days. (The value of N is set in NPSP Settings, under Donations, GAU Allocations.) NPSP updates this field in a nightly Scheduled Job.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Total Allocations Last N Days
